attributes.action: Make law the microchipping, licensing and registration of all dogs.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The technology exists to track & trace dogs to their owners by means of a tiny microchip or tattoo. It is cheap & safe.

There is a growing problem in the UK with regard to dangerous dogs, who are now being used a a form of weapon.

Dogs are completely unregulated. This is ridiculous.

Law must be brought in to ensure that dogs who attack can be easily traced and thier owners to be made accountable.
